Stopping the threads and tasks
stop() - Method in class ColorioServer.Server
Stops the threads by setting isRunning to false Waits a second then interrupts the ServerOut if necessary (because of the BlockingQueue) ServerIn should stop because of the timeOut Closes the Socket
